## utils.dom.createSvgElement() function

Helper method for creating SVG elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createSvgElement<T extends SVGElement>(name: string | Svg<T>, attrs: any, opt_parent?: Element): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string \| Svg&lt;T&gt; | Element's tag name. |
|  attrs | any | Dictionary of attribute names and values. |
|  opt\_parent | Element | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional parent on which to append the element.  if name is a string or a more specific type if it a member of Svg.  Blockly.utils.dom.createSvgElement |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
